銀.definition: silver; silver-colored; relating to money or currency

銀丹.definition: lunar caustic (fused silver nitrate, shaped into a stick and used as a cauterizing agent)

銀元.definition: flat silver (former coinage); also written 銀圓|银圆; silver dollar

銀光.definition: silvery light; bright white light; shining white light

銀喉長尾山雀.pinyin: yín hóu zhǎng wěi shān què
銀喉長尾山雀.definition: (bird species of China) silver-throated bushtit (Aegithalos glaucogularis)

銀圓.definition: flat silver (former coinage); also written 銀元|银元; silver dollar

銀壇.definition: moviedom; the world of movies; film circles

銀屏.definition: television; TV screen; the silver screen

銀川.definition: see 銀川市|银川市[Yin2chuan1 Shi4]

銀川市.definition: Yinchuan, prefecture-level city and capital of Ningxia Hui Autonomous Region 寧夏回族自治區|宁夏回族自治区[Ning2xia4 Hui2zu2 Zi4zhi4qu1]

銀州.definition: Yinzhou district of Tieling city 鐵嶺市|铁岭市[Tie3 ling3 shi4], Liaoning

銀州區.definition: Yinzhou district of Tieling city 鐵嶺市|铁岭市[Tie3 ling3 shi4], Liaoning

銀樣鑞槍頭.definition: silvery spear point actually made of pewter (idiom); fig. worthless despite an attractive exterior

銀河系.definition: Milky Way Galaxy; the galaxy (our galaxy)

銀洋.definition: flat silver (former coinage); also written 銀元|银元

銀海.definition: moviedom; the world of movies; film circles

銀海區.definition: Yinhai district of Beihai city 北海市[Bei3 hai3 shi4], Guangxi

銀漢.definition: Milky Way; also called 銀河|银河[Yin2 he2]

銀熊獎.definition: Silver Bear, award at the Berlin International Film Festival

銀狐.definition: silver or black fox (Vulpes alopex argentatus); also written 玄狐

銀獅獎.definition: Silver Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival

銀監會.definition: China Banking Regulatory Commission (CBRC), abbr. for 中國銀行業監督管理委員會|中国银行业监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]

銀票.definition: (in former times) banknote with a value in silver

銀紅.definition: pink; silvery red; pale rose color

銀絲捲.definition: yin si juan, steamed bun from Shandong province with hand-drawn dough threads folded over

銀絲族.definition: the older generation (respectful term); old folk; silver-haired generation

銀耳.definition: white fungus (Tremella fuciformis); silver tree-ear fungus

銀耳噪鶥.definition: (bird species of China) silver-eared laughingthrush (Trochalopteron melanostigma)

銀耳相思鳥.definition: (bird species of China) silver-eared mesia (Leiothrix argentauris)

銀胸闊嘴鳥.definition: (bird species of China) silver-breasted broadbill (Serilophus lunatus)

銀臉長尾山雀.pinyin: yín liǎn zhǎng wěi shān què
銀臉長尾山雀.definition: (bird species of China) sooty bushtit (Aegithalos fuliginosus)

銀苔.definition: moss silver; silver in the form of fibers or branches

銀針.definition: silver needle (fine needle used in acupuncture)

銀閣寺.definition: Ginkaku-ji or Silver Pavilion in Kyoto 京都[Jing1 du1], Japan, officially called Jishōji 慈照寺[Ci2 zhao4 si4]

銀魚.definition: oriental whitebait; slender silvery-white fish e.g. Galaxias maculatus and Salangichthys microdon

銀鷗.definition: (bird species of China) European herring gull (Larus argentatus)

銀點.definition: the silver point; the melting point of silver 962°C used as a calibration point in some temperature scales
